"A.D.2028/3/24": "I'm drained... Who knew shopping and bathing could be this tiring."
"Aru, how's the bed? There should be a pillow there."
"Yeah, I'm okay."
"Alright then, I'll switch off the lights."
"Haah... Feels like it's been forever since my last sleep."
"One little lamb, two little lambs..."
"Hyaa?!"
"A-Aru? What's wrong? Your bed is right there."
"Eh... Aru... Are you trembling?"
"I'm sorry, Big sis... I'm... I'm scared of the dark."
"It feels like I'm being carried away to someplace scary..."
"I'm scared that I will go back to where I came from if we're not together..."
"Come here, Aru."
"...Eh, really?"
"I'm your Big sis after all. I can't leave my frightened little brother alone can I? Come, quickly."
"...Okay. Thank you Big sis."
"Aru's feelings, I know them very well. I really understand how he feels."
"I just feel so much more at ease when there's someone there for me..."
"That's because I've always been alone here in the Ship's Bridge, all by myself! I felt very lonely..."
"But hey, thanks to <%me>, I'm not lonely anymore. Hehe."
